data.name: Through The Fragmentation Demo
data.detailed_description:
"Have you ever really tried to escape from here? This place feels like a strange prison and it actually is, believe me. There must be an exit somewhere..."


Through The Fragmentation is a first person aventure game focusing on non-linear exploration. You can talk to the many strange inhabitants of the City, discover hidden areas and secrets, or just try to piece together the mystery of the Fragmentation - it's up to you. Tasks can be solved in different ways, but the demo has only one ending.

This version is identical to the demo published on GameJolt and Itch.io.

NOTE: Players can experience framerate issues on low-end computers. Also, the demo runs in native resolution.

Join the community On Discord

data.short_description: Through The Fragmentation is a first person aventure game focusing on non-linear exploration. You can talk to the many strange inhabitants of the City, discover hidden areas and secrets, or just try to piece together the mystery of the Fragmentation - it's up to you.
data.reviews:
“Fragmentation is a delightful study in how to make even a straightforward world feel real enough to touch...”
RE:BIND

“The strange world of the Bird People is a fascinating place to explore.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2330M CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce G 105M 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 108 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 2048MB GDDR5 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 108 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
